entry.title: Stroller Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 18.00

Description
Pretty simple - turn any bag - with d-rings that you would normally strap a removable strap to - and turn it into a diaper bag. All you need is our Tote Insert and these Stroller Straps and you've pretty much just made your own innovative mom (or dad) on the go bag!
Specifications
Dims: 10" Loop
Materials: Poly Webbing with silicone grip
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.25lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- logo straps with snap hooks to wrap around stroller handles and connect any diaper bag with d-rings
- silicone grip on poly webbing prevents slippage
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Seatback Organizer in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 24.00

Description

Ever put your hand in the seat back pocket of a plane and come out with a mysterious sticky finger?! Not anymore! Our seatback pocket was designed to keep your travel essentials AND your hands free from the mystery of the seat back pocket! A couple slip pockets for smaller items, a long zip pocket in back for important travel documents and hidden magnets that 'lock' it in place. When you’re done, just fold it up and pack away. Bon voyage, germs!

 
Specifications

Dims: 5.5"H x 12.5"W
Materials:
Body - PU,
Trim- PVC, nylon zippers
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1lb
Details

EXTERIOR
- easy to clean faux leather (PVC) material
- embossed BÉIS logo
INTERIOR
- hidden magnetic closure - to secure close or secure around seat-back pocket
- one long slip pocket (magazine, tablet, book)
- 3 small slip pockets (fits up to 3.5" cellphone, ear buds, tissues, antibacterial wipes, chapstick, glasses, sunnies, boarding pass, contact case, pens, passport
- long clear PVC zip pocket (boarding pass, passport, customs forms, skin care, eye mask, ear plugs, socks)
PERFECT FOR
Keeping travel essentials organized and at your ﬁngertips - no more hands in the germy seat back pocket

entry.title: The Passport & Luggage Tag Set in Black Patent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 23.80

Description

What you need when you're on the go, full stop. A Passport Holder that acts as a mini wallet, a luggage tag to stylishly mark your territory, and a bonus clear pouch for all your last minute essentials and liquids. Feel like the most experienced traveler, even if it's your first flight!

 
Shay's Inspo

"This is an essential trio for any serious traveler. I wanted to have something to identify your precious luggage, and to protect one of our most important possessions - our passports - while traveling. The clear bag is perfect for tossing mini-bottles in to the weekender for easy grabbing at security." - Shay 
Details

4-PIECE SET
Ready, set, go.
CLEAR POUCH
3-1-1, here we come!
PEN HOLDER + PEN
No more asking your neighbor.
CARD HOLDER
Keep it together—just don’t lose it.
GOLD LOGO
Baggage claim meets a bit of bling.
